name: Scaleway
description: European cloud provider offering innovative cloud infrastructure solutions and managed services.
longDescription: Scaleway is a leading European cloud provider delivering innovative infrastructure solutions including virtual instances, managed Kubernetes, object storage, serverless computing, and dedicated servers. With data centers located in France, Netherlands, and Poland, Scaleway is fully GDPR compliant and ensures robust data security and reliability. Scaleway emphasizes developer-friendly, sustainable, and cost-effective cloud services.

productDetails.name: Scaleway Elements
productDetails.description: High-performance virtual servers with rapid deployment and flexible configurations.

productDetails.name: Managed Kubernetes
productDetails.description: Fully managed Kubernetes service enabling simplified container management and scalability.

productDetails.name: Object Storage
productDetails.description: Highly scalable and secure object storage solution suitable for backups, archives, and cloud-native apps.

productDetails.name: Serverless Functions
productDetails.description: Fully managed serverless computing platform for rapid development and deployment of functions and apps.
